This is a love story
The love and respect I have for my big sister Izabela Pinto and our passion for the magnificent Amazon rainforest. This is her struggle to reforest an area devastated by illegal lumbering.
It's no secret that the Amazon jungle is in danger and with a rise of 22% in deforestation since 2012
column2: the threat on the environment has not stopped.  Pacaré is a little piece of this paradise in the state of Pará, Brazil.  Izabela has poured her savings, her sweat, and her life into this project of planting trees and restoring the habitat.  She's worked to protect the wildlife and bring balance back to Pacaré.  It's been an 8 year labor of love and my sisters courage and determination through every obstacle should inspire all of us.

column1: Her beloved Pacaré is beautiful today and a testament to understanding our responsibility for nature.  There's still much work to be done but her funds are depleted, that's where you can help us keep planting.  Her dream has always been to share this incredible adventure called the Amazon with everyone and we have a plan to continue the reforestation with revenue generated yearly.  We will construct an eco-lodge and show our guests the fragility of the Amazon and it's importance in our lives world wide. Of course it'll be an advenure our traveler's won´t forget but more importantly it will help raise an awareness to a problem that cannot be ignored.

Your generous contribution is so valuable, but more valuable is your interest in understanding what we stand to lose if more land is destroyed in the Amazon.  Look what one person can do and let's see what all of us can accomplish together.
<ul>
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
<h3><span style=""line-height: 26px
column3: >We will need U$90,000, to build the lodge, a water treatment system, install solar energy and buy all the necessary equipament to start our work.

column1: We calculated down to the penny and keep in mind that our aim is to be as natural as possible including materials that have no impact on the environment at all.
<ul>
• Construction (Engineering, architect, materials, and labor) $45000
• Water Supply (Well enlargement, Treatment) $3820
• Lodge (beds, furniture, hammocks, lockers, bedding, etc.) $11748
• Solar Energy (Panels, transformer and labor)$20000
• Appliances (freezers, washing machine, and A/C units) $6762
<li><span style=""background-color: initial
These estimates are a bare minimum to build and open. We are so grateful for any assistance provide to us but If
we don´t reach our goal, any funding we receive will be used to buy the
material necessary to start the construction, while we try to secure more to

finish the lodge.  This is a big challenge to us, but a great opportunity too.
In deep thanks for your support we want you to have such one a kind perks as a keep sake to remember your commitment in saving the rainforest. Our beloved region is known for having the best leather craftsman so with your caring gift of $25 your will receive a handmade personalized leather key chain to always remember your special place in this struggle.
Yellow Ipê, once abundant in Pacaré´s region, today almost extint.
<ul>
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >A t-shirt with our logo the symbol of Pacaré, the yellow Ipê flowering tree will be presented to those who donate $100 or more. This lovely tree was so plentiful in these forests but unfortunately it's high value created a demand and it's been reduced to almost extinction. Of course Izabela has made sure they are planted in Pacaré and hopefully the seeds will blossom throughout this area again.

column1: The lodge will adorn a plaque with the names of our generous patrons who donate $300 or more. Your compassionate gift will forever be remembered as we proudly display our heartfelt thanks for your belief in us and the Amazon.
We just need your help to take the first step in order to
continue the reserve.<span style=""font-family: 'Benton Sans', Helvetica, sans-serif
column4: >This kickoff will be our goal for the future of Pacaré Reserve.
column7: >So please support us in this life project and preservation

column1: of the earth´s most important natural biome, the Amazon Rainforest.
If in 8 years one person alone did so much, imagine this
place in 10 years with your help! Let's plant thousands more trees and keep our planet healthy!
<b style=""font-size: 24px
column4: >8 years well spent...the benefits we share

column1: <div><span style=""line-height: 30px
<div>
<span style='letter-spacing: 0px
column3: '>I'll explain more about my brave sister and my family, so you can understand why this project so important to us and the community. Our roots in this region run as deep as the mahogany that grows in Pacare's forests. Our family life's blood has always been this river and the jungle. The Amazon has provided everything to our family and this community. Our respect and compassion for nature completes the give and take theory that should be utilized world wide in environmental concerns.

column1: <div>
<span style='letter-spacing: 0px
column3: '>Pacare's land was completely exhausted of all nutrients, a casualty of irresponsible logging. The wildlife and the environment were thrown into turmoil. Izabela researched the most natural ways to replenish the soil. She utilized Acacia trees to feed the earth and fruit trees to the feed the wildlife.  The animals would then return to Pacare and help spread seeds throughout the property.
column6: />The remaining native trees were barely clinging to life.<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px

column7: >Our family rallied behind Izabela and helped cultivate and plant. Her determination to give back is unique and I admire her greatly. She would continue planting through difficult times like Pacare's invasion of a neighbor's livestock that devoured her pineapple seedlings. She pushed on and protected her plants from termites and ant infestations with care not to pollute the delicate habitat with poisons. Every challenge Izabela faced she handled with hope and solutions just like the struggle we all now must understand in regards to this planets future.

column1: Family support
rustic nursery for seedling

column3: '>Your charitable donation brings so many benefits to this region. The lodge is a means to share this gem in the Amazon with everyone. Pacare is proof that the our precious forests can be saved as long as people care enough. This is the seed of cooperation that we intend to cultivate in the public. Our mission is to provide something unique in every way, to balance the opportunity of adventure and the rewards of preservation for our guests.

column1: They all live in Paytuna Community. Let´s help them keep these beautiful smiles!

column4: >The positive affects of our lodge on a local level are fantastic. We'll be helping our neighbors, the community of Paytuna, providing jobs and teaching skills that can bring better conditions to their lives. Paytuna is a small fishing village of poor struggling families desperately in need of assistance. The system of education in these rural towns are very relaxed and has no support from the city government. Many of the people are illiterate. We intend to contribute profits from the lodge to secure these families a chance to learn by building a library and funding programs aimed at teaching the young and old. We have so many plans to help develop Paytuna and with the lodge proceeds, these people will have the opportunity to advance in ways never available before. We must give back to them like we do the jungle to assure that we reverse the wasteful ways this region is abused and guarantee our future. Please visit our website for details on our future plans including a wildlife rescue.

column3: '>We are at a crucial point in our environmental challenges worldwide. If we move forward at this rate and disregard the signs of global warming, we will soon find ourselves too far gone. People and nature should be our main concerns and correlating the two without loss to either has to be the focus of our progress. The forests have been named the lungs of our planet with good reason. They take carbon dioxide in and deliver clean oxygen for us to breath. The Amazon rainforest because of it's sheer size is 1/4 of this natural filter protecting and giving us life. Such a large part of this valuable process would be sadly missed if we don't give back and only take. Think of the vitamins and medicine we consume to fight disease. Chances are most of those curative elements are derived from flowers, plants, berries, and roots. Where are all these miracle wonders found? That's right in rainforests. Now consider that scientists have only actually studied 1% of all the species of plants found in the Amazon. So where would we be if the destruction continues? Think of all the cures waiting to be discovered just lost along with the forests. According to a resent study by the International Union of Conservation for Nature (IUCN), half the plant species of the Amazon Rainforest is in danger of extinction. IUCN also confirms that parks and reserves can protect most of these endangered species both animal and plant.
'>Sometimes we think these exotic places are so distant from our every day lives but the truth is their relationship to us is far closer then we could ever imagine.

column1: Risks &
column2:
Challenge 

We value an effort worthwhile and the best way to describe our intention in Pacaré is nature comes first. That means these surroundings must always be kept native and pure. As we progress in building this dream, we will work with the Rainforest Alliance to fulfill all requirements on becoming a green business. Not a difficult thing when Izabela has spent the last 8 years working and thinking ""green"". We want Pacaré to be considered the destination when traveling to the Amazon for nature enthusiasts. This region has so much to offer with it's breathtaking waterfalls and ancient cave paintings to explore, not to mention the rich culture that our people want to share with all of you.

column1: Advertising and publicity will be our greatest challenge. I have no doubt that our reputation will carry Pacaré to success once our first group of adventurers participate in .The experience and friendships they take with them will solidify their recommendation. This region has always been the best kept secret treasure of the Amazon and it's time for it to receive the acclaim it deserves. The solution is the internet which has opened limitless avenues to carry our honest story and create the connections needed to gain momentum. The difficulties of the initial phase post construction will be tackled with an initiative of promotion. We will participate in eco-tourism expos and build relationships with travel agencies that cater to this form of vacation.

Our greatest advantage is simply the knowledge of this region's wealth of activities to experience and the locations of its most remarkable sites. As mentioned earlier our family has lived in the Amazon for generations and now we will be your guides to explore this mythical river and its wildlife. This jungle lodge will be like no other and it's location in the heart of rainforest is only one aspect that sets Pacare apart. Of course the adventure tourist will have horseback riding, hiking, rock climbing, canoeing and jungle excursions but our dedication to preservation and sharing the gratifying results of conservation is our unique addition to this growing market.

Spread the word

I realize that these can be hard times for all of us financially. If you've taken the time to read and watch our presentation to this point then I'm sure you understand our desire to help. I also know you would give if you could because our struggle is also yours. We are all in this together and we must do our part in any capacity to insure our world continues and flourishes. So please tell people about our campaign and the good that it represents. Please learn more about the environmental issues that are so relevant. We will accomplish this beacon of preservation here and you are invited. Come and feel the wind off the river and know the reasons for our passion. The children will need things to excite and interest them so if you would like to donate coloring books, crayons, school supplies, anything then contact us and we will schedule a way to facilitate the delivery of your offerings.
Keep up with us on Facebook and Pacaré Reserve website and be a part of our growth. Please interact with us on ideas or observations about our cause or news stories related to this.
","This is a love story
The love and respect I have for my big sister Izabela Pinto and our passion for the magnificent Amazon rainforest. This is her struggle to reforest an area devastated by illegal lumbering.
It's no secret that the Amazon jungle is in danger and with a rise of 22% in deforestation since 2012
column2: the threat on the environment has not stopped.  Pacaré is a little piece of this paradise in the state of Pará, Brazil.  Izabela has poured her savings, her sweat, and her life into this project of planting trees and restoring the habitat.  She's worked to protect the wildlife and bring balance back to Pacaré.  It's been an 8 year labor of love and my sisters courage and determination through every obstacle should inspire all of us.

column1: Her beloved Pacaré is beautiful today and a testament to understanding our responsibility for nature.  There's still much work to be done but her funds are depleted, that's where you can help us keep planting.  Her dream has always been to share this incredible adventure called the Amazon with everyone and we have a plan to continue the reforestation with revenue generated yearly.  We will construct an eco-lodge and show our guests the fragility of the Amazon and it's importance in our lives world wide. Of course it'll be an advenure our traveler's won´t forget but more importantly it will help raise an awareness to a problem that cannot be ignored.

Your generous contribution is so valuable, but more valuable is your interest in understanding what we stand to lose if more land is destroyed in the Amazon.  Look what one person can do and let's see what all of us can accomplish together.
Now Let's continue planting some trees...
We will need U$90,000, to build the lodge, a water treatment system, install solar energy and buy all the necessary equipament to start our work.
We calculated down to the penny and keep in mind that our aim is to be as natural as possible including materials that have no impact on the environment at all.
Construction (Engineering, architect, materials, and labor) $45000
Water Supply (Well enlargement, Treatment) $3820
Lodge (beds, furniture, hammocks, lockers, bedding, etc.) $11748
Solar Energy (Panels, transformer and labor)$20000
Appliances (freezers, washing machine, and A/C units) $6762
Personnel (Hospitality training, uniforms, and advertising)$2670
These estimates are a bare minimum to build and open. We are so grateful for any assistance provide to us but If
we don´t reach our goal, any funding we receive will be used to buy the
material necessary to start the construction, while we try to secure more to

finish the lodge.  This is a big challenge to us, but a great opportunity too.In deep thanks for your support we want you to have such one a kind perks as a keep sake to remember your commitment in saving the rainforest. Our beloved region is known for having the best leather craftsman so with your caring gift of $25 your will receive a handmade personalized leather key chain to always remember your special place in this struggle.
Yellow Ipê, once abundant in Pacaré´s region, today almost extint.

A t-shirt with our logo the symbol of Pacaré, the yellow Ipê flowering tree will be presented to those who donate $100 or more. This lovely tree was so plentiful in these forests but unfortunately it's high value created a demand and it's been reduced to almost extinction. Of course Izabela has made sure they are planted in Pacaré and hopefully the seeds will blossom throughout this area again.

The lodge will adorn a plaque with the names of our generous patrons who donate $300 or more. Your compassionate gift will forever be remembered as we proudly display our heartfelt thanks for your belief in us and the Amazon.
We just need your help to take the first step in order to
continue the reserve.This kickoff will be our goal for the future of Pacaré Reserve. So please support us in this life project and preservation
of the earth´s most important natural biome, the Amazon Rainforest.
If in 8 years one person alone did so much, imagine this
place in 10 years with your help! Let's plant thousands more trees and keep our planet healthy!
8 years well spent...the benefits we share
Pacaré today

I'll explain more about my brave sister and my family, so you can understand why this project so important to us and the community. Our roots in this region run as deep as the mahogany that grows in Pacare's forests. Our family life's blood has always been this river and the jungle. The Amazon has provided everything to our family and this community. Our respect and compassion for nature completes the give and take theory that should be utilized world wide in environmental concerns.

Pacare's land was completely exhausted of all nutrients, a casualty of irresponsible logging. The wildlife and the environment were thrown into turmoil. Izabela researched the most natural ways to replenish the soil. She utilized Acacia trees to feed the earth and fruit trees to the feed the wildlife.  The animals would then return to Pacare and help spread seeds throughout the property.                                                       The remaining native trees were barely clinging to life.

Our family rallied behind Izabela and helped cultivate and plant. Her determination to give back is unique and I admire her greatly. She would continue planting through difficult times like Pacare's invasion of a neighbor's livestock that devoured her pineapple seedlings. She pushed on and protected her plants from termites and ant infestations with care not to pollute the delicate habitat with poisons. Every challenge Izabela faced she handled with hope and solutions just like the struggle we all now must understand in regards to this planets future.
Family support
rustic nursery for seedling

Your charitable donation brings so many benefits to this region. The lodge is a means to share this gem in the Amazon with everyone. Pacare is proof that the our precious forests can be saved as long as people care enough. This is the seed of cooperation that we intend to cultivate in the public. Our mission is to provide something unique in every way, to balance the opportunity of adventure and the rewards of preservation for our guests.
They all live in Paytuna Community. Let´s help them keep these beautiful smiles!

The positive affects of our lodge on a local level are fantastic. We'll be helping our neighbors, the community of Paytuna, providing jobs and teaching skills that can bring better conditions to their lives. Paytuna is a small fishing village of poor struggling families desperately in need of assistance. The system of education in these rural towns are very relaxed and has no support from the city government. Many of the people are illiterate. We intend to contribute profits from the lodge to secure these families a chance to learn by building a library and funding programs aimed at teaching the young and old. We have so many plans to help develop Paytuna and with the lodge proceeds, these people will have the opportunity to advance in ways never available before. We must give back to them like we do the jungle to assure that we reverse the wasteful ways this region is abused and guarantee our future. Please visit our website for details on our future plans including a wildlife rescue.

We are at a crucial point in our environmental challenges worldwide. If we move forward at this rate and disregard the signs of global warming, we will soon find ourselves too far gone. People and nature should be our main concerns and correlating the two without loss to either has to be the focus of our progress. The forests have been named the lungs of our planet with good reason. They take carbon dioxide in and deliver clean oxygen for us to breath. The Amazon rainforest because of it's sheer size is 1/4 of this natural filter protecting and giving us life. Such a large part of this valuable process would be sadly missed if we don't give back and only take. Think of the vitamins and medicine we consume to fight disease. Chances are most of those curative elements are derived from flowers, plants, berries, and roots. Where are all these miracle wonders found? That's right in rainforests. Now consider that scientists have only actually studied 1% of all the species of plants found in the Amazon. So where would we be if the destruction continues? Think of all the cures waiting to be discovered just lost along with the forests. According to a resent study by the International Union of Conservation for Nature (IUCN), half the plant species of the Amazon Rainforest is in danger of extinction. IUCN also confirms that parks and reserves can protect most of these endangered species both animal and plant.
Sometimes we think these exotic places are so distant from our every day lives but the truth is their relationship to us is far closer then we could ever imagine.

Risks & Challenge  We value an effort worthwhile and the best way to describe our intention in Pacaré is nature comes first. That means these surroundings must always be kept native and pure. As we progress in building this dream, we will work with the Rainforest Alliance to fulfill all requirements on becoming a green business. Not a difficult thing when Izabela has spent the last 8 years working and thinking ""green"". We want Pacaré to be considered the destination when traveling to the Amazon for nature enthusiasts. This region has so much to offer with it's breathtaking waterfalls and ancient cave paintings to explore, not to mention the rich culture that our people want to share with all of you.

Advertising and publicity will be our greatest challenge. I have no doubt that our reputation will carry Pacaré to success once our first group of adventurers participate in .The experience and friendships they take with them will solidify their recommendation. This region has always been the best kept secret treasure of the Amazon and it's time for it to receive the acclaim it deserves. The solution is the internet which has opened limitless avenues to carry our honest story and create the connections needed to gain momentum. The difficulties of the initial phase post construction will be tackled with an initiative of promotion. We will participate in eco-tourism expos and build relationships with travel agencies that cater to this form of vacation.

Our greatest advantage is simply the knowledge of this region's wealth of activities to experience and the locations of its most remarkable sites. As mentioned earlier our family has lived in the Amazon for generations and now we will be your guides to explore this mythical river and its wildlife. This jungle lodge will be like no other and it's location in the heart of rainforest is only one aspect that sets Pacare apart. Of course the adventure tourist will have horseback riding, hiking, rock climbing, canoeing and jungle excursions but our dedication to preservation and sharing the gratifying results of conservation is our unique addition to this growing market.

Spread the word I realize that these can be hard times for all of us financially. If you've taken the time to read and watch our presentation to this point then I'm sure you understand our desire to help. I also know you would give if you could because our struggle is also yours. We are all in this together and we must do our part in any capacity to insure our world continues and flourishes. So please tell people about our campaign and the good that it represents. Please learn more about the environmental issues that are so relevant. We will accomplish this beacon of preservation here and you are invited. Come and feel the wind off the river and know the reasons for our passion. The children will need things to excite and interest them so if you would like to donate coloring books, crayons, school supplies, anything then contact us and we will schedule a way to facilitate the delivery of your offerings.

Keep up with us on Facebook and Pacaré Reserve website and be a part of our growth. Please interact with us on ideas or observations about our cause or news stories related to this.",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Monte Alegre - Para, Brazil",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-amazing-amazon-help-save-a-part-of-this-gift/pica

<h3><strong>LET’S KEEP OUR SEA CLEAN &amp

Surfers4sea is a non-profit organisation started by surfers and nature lovers because we realised that it is time to take action. Together, we are working to inspire, unite, educate and raise awareness about the problem of plastic pollution. We want to bring communities together and empower them to protect our seas and marine life by becoming active ambassadors of the change we want to see.
We need some wind in our sails - that's where you come in

We need your help to start it all up, and this is why we created this crowdfunding campaign. The funds will enable us to start doing concrete work and on the ground activities, such as clean-ups, awareness raising campaigns and events, stakeholder engagement, school visits and lectures, community work, networking, launching our web site and much more.
To say thank you we have prepared some really cool perks. Companies such as MIRET and Cloud&
column2: Co share our passion for nature and after hearing our story decided to come on board and help us out.  Thanks guys!

column1: Take a closer look at the perks we offer, each one of them is created with love and care for both nature and people. To make this campaign a reality we the surfers became photo-models,  designers, accountants, social media experts, writers, retailers and web developers.  However, we did it in our own way - with a heart full of love and trust in each other and in the people that will read this.
Big Impact Starts Small

Plastics represent most of the waste found in seas around the world and the main type of waste found on beaches. Most plastic is not biodegradable and remains in the environment for hundreds of years. We know that making radical changes is tough and that plastic is sometimes inevitable. People can have clean up actions forever, but this will not solve the problem. We are the problem, we all need to change our ways. Big impact starts small
column2: this is why surfers4sea are working to make a network of surfers, nature lovers, outdoor enthusiasts and surf/windsurf/kitesurf centers across Mediterranean so we can act together and lead by example to shift the attitudes, promote a zero-waste lifestyle, connect people with nature and encourage other people to do the same.

column1: Every fall is a new opportunity

There is a risk that we might not reach our funding goal, bear in mind that you will not be charged if our campaign doesn't reach the set benchmark. If this happens we will try again.  Surfers are known for being stubborn in overcoming obstacles. With every fall we learn a lesson and then we try again, and again until we make it.
If you arrived here you helped

There are million ways you can help, make some noise about our cause, carry a reusable bottle, say no to plastic cutlery, follow us on Facebook and Instagram (@surfers4sea), share our crowdfunding link through Indiegogo share tools and spread the word!

As this is a donation, we aren't legally obliged to send you a thank you gift for  but we will do our best to do so and have them with you by the set date as our way of saying thank you.

What is WasteQuest?

WasteQuest will be a rewarding mobile application and website to encourage people to rethink, reuse, and recycle their daily waste. People will be able to list their reusable and recyclable waste for others who are willing to pick it up to reuse and to recycle for income. Also, they will be greatly reducing waste at the same time! WasteQuest will work as a bridge connecting locals and surrounding communities. So that recycling will become much more accessible, efficient, and rewarding. Help me, help the Earth breathe and rejuvenate, Only WE can!
How It Works

People will be able to list their reusable and recyclable waste for others who are willing to pick it up. Either to reuse or recycle for income, we will be greatly reducing waste. The providers who are contributing and distributing the waste will be enrolled in a Monthly Refund Program. Also, they will be receiving 20% (rounded to nearest dollar) from each collected and distributed lot, paid by the gatherer. The gatherers gain through WasteQuest, is that they are going to have a much faster and more efficient work environment, compared to the work they are doing everyday for little income. Also, I strongly urge people who are unemployed, families with little income, or anyone that just needs some money to get by the day or month, to use this system to generate a solid income. Although, access to the mobile application and website it free to all, I must include a monthly subscription fee towards the gatherers. This is to generate enough income to reward providers for what they are doing, and to maintain and upgrade WasteQuest. Oh, let's not forget! A monthly GiveGreen Raffle will be held by WasteQuest, for all participating members in the quest to a healthier Planet! The raffle will have a select number of winners and we will be giving away cash and prizes. This includes gift cards, goods, getaways, and some fresh cash to spend! Everyone deserves a break and some time away from work. Here at WasteQuest we strongly believe in giving back to the people, so in turn the people will be motivated to clean up and reduce waste. I will be describing each part in its own category below.

I have created demo non-functional templates. This will show what I have in mind for the look and feel of WasteQuest. I am working on this entire project alone and do not have the skills and the tools needed to make it into a fully functioning and live application. That's why I've come to Indiegogo to help me make this come to life. The whole thing already exists, I just need the people to give me an opportunity and accept it.
Now the details....
Provider

The provider, gets unlimited access and listing on WasteQuest. The providers role is to collect and distribute the waste he/she usually throws away, which ends up in our dumps, and later our oceans. Now you will be getting paid for all the waste you were ignoring. All you need to do is collect and sacrifice some living space. Keep in mind that that space is retrievable, the damage being done by you and everyone else that is just disregarding the world, and sending everything to the dumps, is absolutely irreversible. What the provider is doing really, is that he/she is hitting two birds with one stone. While the provider collects and distributes, he/she is contributing to the Planet, and at the same time contributing to individuals and families who can really use the money they receive from reusing and recycling.
<ul>
• Free Unlimited access and listing
• Collects and distributes
• Material Pricing Directory for help with pricing of Lots
• Enrollment in Monthly Refund Program+ 20% ( rounded to nearest dollar)  Collectors Fee towards Gatherer, for each individual lot: based on value. Earn over 30% cash back from your waste!
• User profile displaying your contributions and average monthly gain. Users will be able to add you to their ""Watch list"" to follow up on new listings.
• Will receive a monthly check and certificate of contribution displaying statistics for that month. Pounds of material recycled, how they helped, and what they saved.
• Automatic Monthly GiveGreen Raffle Entry
• Helping to reduce waste, clean the planet, and contribute to people in need
Providers User Profile
User Profile

The providers will be able to build a user profile displaying their ranking  and stats. Viewing the users average monthly income through WasteQuest, and how much he/she is contributing to the community. Also, you will be able to contact the provider through messaging and ask for tips and advice on how they are managing their lots and materials. WasteQuest will be and always will remain an honest,supportive, and loving community.
Gatherer

The Gatherers role, is to reuse, recycle, and reduce the waste in his/her community for income. There are millions of people that walk,drive, and search for materials and things they can use, or recycle. With WasteQuest we are bringing these materials and items directly to your home, computer, and pocket. My goal is to connect the people to encourage a more efficient, faster, and rewarding experience when they decide to recycle. WasteQuest will be available to anyone with internet access, and I strongly encourage people who need a solid source of income for rent money, gas, bills. clothes, anything they wish, to check out WasteQuest and see what they can gain from it. Families in need, and the unemployed individuals will cherish this system for its availability and opportunities of income it provides. I would love to see millions of people using WasteQuest, and have the people accept it, so we can see drastic changes in our communities and our environment. The website and mobile application will be available for free to view listings and see materials  and items available. I will need to include a monthly subscription fee towards the Gatherer, and this is for maintaining the system, upgrades, rewarding providers, and holding raffles. Although, I must include a monthly fee, it will barely have any impact on families and individuals using the application. The positive increase in their daily work will be so great, that they will not hesitate to support my program with a monthly fee. Also, the 20% collectors fee must be paid by the Gatherer to the Provider, as a sign of appreciation. This is all calculated and will not affect the Gatherer in any way. The gas they spend driving around searching, or the energy spent walking will be cut down drastically, and the gain will be much greater. I have talked to many individuals who recycle and would love for a program like this to exist. I have mentioned the fees and they all agreed to pay if it would be available. So here it is!
<ul>
• Collects to Reuse, Recycle, and Reduce
• Faster and more efficient way to find recyclables and reusable materials
• Noticeable income growth per month
• Ability to ""Watch"" the provider and track when he/she lists next and receives instant notifications for new lots.
• For families and individuals that need a source of income
• Automatic GiveGreen Monthly Raffle Entry
• Subscription fee of $5.99/ mo + 20% Collector's Fee per lot: based on value (rounded to nearest dollar)
• Recycling our way to a better and healthier planet
Watch List- For Gatherers
Watch List

With the Watch List, the gatherer will be able to track and follow the providers monthly average lots and common materials. Also, the Watch List will include a notification system to let gatherers know the provider has a new listing. When the user opens the providers profile that is where they will find the watch icon. This system will accelerate the entire WasteQuest process.
Choose Your Role! How will you support your community?
3 Different View Modes
There will be different viewing styles to fit each users needs.

column2: 3 different view styles"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://s3.amazonaws.com/ksr/assets/000/744/290/0865eae73e16d866c48c61e7568d5734_large.jpg?1373749128"" src="""" style=""""/>

column1: Home screen &
Monthly Ranked Refund Program - For Providers

The Monthly Ranked Refund Program is for Providers so they can receive money from WasteQuest for their participation. The ranking system displays your Lots collected and distributed, and each rank will have a separate name and badge. In every level you are given the opportunity to make more money and continue to grow! It is entirely up to you to choose how far you can push yourself and keep trying to beat last months achievements! The refund program is generating income for Providers that just discarded their waste and had a total loss of money. Now you are given the chance to accumulate over 30% of your spending back from your collected waste! All you need to do is collect, list, and distribute.
<ul>
• Rank 1= 1-4 Lots - $3-$12- Avg/Mo/Income - $18- Collector's Fee Included
• Rank 2= 5-9 Lots - $15- $27- Avg/Mo/Income- $42- Collector's Fee Included
• Rank 3= 10+ Lots - $30+ $2 additional per drop after 10- Avg/Mo/income- $60+ - Collector's Fee Included
• Minimum Lot size value should be around $8+ to be considered a point towards ranking and to be eligible for 20% Collectors fee.
• I am open to people deciding the best ranking names. If you have any in mind please don't hesitate to post in the comment section. I assure you it will not go unnoticed.
Common Recyclable Material Value Chart

Once I am able to hire developers and build a team, I will be including a daily updated price list of the most common materials. Providers can use this directory for estimated pricing towards their Lot Value. Based on the estimated value, they will receive 20% from Gatherers, as a sign of appreciation. This gives the Provider total control over growth and planning of how to list his/her lots to get their top dollar back from garbage he/she used to throw away! Now you can use the money towards anything you like! How about some groceries to recycle the process? Just collect and build reasonable lot sizes to distribute to people willing to do the rest of the work! On average with the Collectors fee and the Refund Program, you will be receiving over 30% cash back monthly towards your spent money that generated the waste in the first place! Also, I would love to make available an instant material pricing Online help or Phone Support, for materials that might be missing from our directory. This is to get everyone the right pricing, and to continue to grow our material pricing database.
Nearest Recycling Centers

WasteQuest will also be able to help you find the nearest recycling center. It will contain all information needed from what type of materials they recycle, to when they close, and how to get there. You will be given the option to navigate there and contact the company.
Total Income Simulator

I will be including a Total Income Simulator for both roles. With this system you can predict and experiment what you can accomplish per day or month. The Total Income Simulator will give you a good template on how to make more money, your expenses, etc. I am working on providing the community with as much tools as possible so the job gets easier and becomes faster.  In return, these tools will make recycling more efficient and overall more rewarding.
GiveGreen Monthly Raffle

Every end of the month, WasteQuest will be holding a raffle for its users! I strongly believe in giving back to the people, and just making life that much easier. From the revenue gained from WasteQuest, we will focus on making the community happier and healthier, by supporting everyone that supports us.
<ul>
• Cash Prizes
• Goods giveaways
• Vacation getaways
• Gas cards, gift cards
• The prizes will get greater as we encourage more people to participate in the Green Revolution!

• I would love to have the chance to award the top contributor of each month with a tailored vacation getaway. I want to give someone the chance to plan their own trip where ever they want to go. With a set amount of credit they will be able to decide and WasteQuest would love to make it happen.
Rules
<ul>
• Provider's Lot must be about $8 in material value to be reasonable for listing.

• Gatherer will be able to reserve 2 Lots every 15 minutes. Their account will be restricted from further bookings temporarily. This is to balance the distribution of materials to all people as equally as possible, and give everyone an opportunity.
• Gatherer must show booking conformation to Provider before the transaction to validate that he/she is the correct person that reserved the Lot(s) .

• The GiveGreen Raffle will occur every month before the month ends. So people receive their prizes before big bad rent and bills come around!. We will be giving away cash, gift cards, getaways, and the prizes just get better with more users. All people participating in WasteQuest will be entered in the monthly raffle. Give back and grow!
Fees

I do not enjoy charging a fee for the service. I am forced to because of the system. The revenue will go mostly towards Providers Monthly Refunds and our GiveGreen Raffle. The rest of the money will be spent towards maintaining and updating the system, and of course paying the Apple and Android based markets. The fees are as follows:
<ul>

• Monthly subscription fee of $5.99 for Gatherers. You will be given free download and access to the application, but in order to access reservations and contact information, you must enroll in the monthly subscription.

• A 20% Collectors Fee (rounded to nearest dollar)  will have to be paid upon pick-up to the Provider per Lot. Again, we must show our appreciation. There is much to be gained from WasteQuest, I do not believe these minimal fees will interfere with peoples financial status.
What do ""Lots"" and ""Reservations"" mean?
<ul>

• A ""Lot"" is referring to the material value and completed amount of the material you have collected as a Provider. Your 20% fee will be based on material value you have collected and these will be identified as ""Lots"".

• ""Reserving"" is referring to the process when after searching through the listings and when you are ready to pick it up, you must first ""Reserve"" it to yourself and your account. This way the ""Provider"" knows there is someone on the way to pick up their collected materials, and it is used to validate the ""Gatherers"" identity. Gatherers are allowed only 2 Lot reservations every 15 minutes to promote a balanced system.
Now You're Ready!
Risks and challenges

The challenges that come with this project is really the funding, and acceptance from the people. I have worked on this all on my own and if I was to be able to hire a professional developer for the mobile application and the website, and build a TEAM! I wouldn't have any problems. I have no prior experience in any of this, but I have managed to build a sample mobile application displaying what I have in mind. I am fully capable of leaping over every hurdle put in front of me. All my plans are written and solidified. I only need to produce the full application. Everything from beginning to end I have stored in my imagination. I know exactly what I want it to look like and I've tried to duplicate my imagination with the simple online tools I was provided. Didn't come out how I see it but its a template to show you that I know what I'm aiming for. I am not worried about putting my time into developing and launching the website and application I know it will be successful. I only need the funding and people to help achieve this. Thank you everyone for your support! It will never be forgotten and always will be appreciated. I will be forever in dept to all the people that supported a healthier, smarter, and more efficient generation. Thank you Indiegogo, for believing in my work and my goals. Without you I would not have the opportunity, nor the recognition to be able to pull this off.
- Aram Mikayelian
","What is WasteQuest?

WasteQuest will be a rewarding mobile application and website to encourage people to rethink, reuse, and recycle their daily waste. People will be able to list their reusable and recyclable waste for others who are willing to pick it up to reuse and to recycle for income. Also, they will be greatly reducing waste at the same time! WasteQuest will work as a bridge connecting locals and surrounding communities. So that recycling will become much more accessible, efficient, and rewarding. Help me, help the Earth breathe and rejuvenate, Only WE can!
How It Works

People will be able to list their reusable and recyclable waste for others who are willing to pick it up. Either to reuse or recycle for income, we will be greatly reducing waste. The providers who are contributing and distributing the waste will be enrolled in a Monthly Refund Program. Also, they will be receiving 20% (rounded to nearest dollar) from each collected and distributed lot, paid by the gatherer. The gatherers gain through WasteQuest, is that they are going to have a much faster and more efficient work environment, compared to the work they are doing everyday for little income. Also, I strongly urge people who are unemployed, families with little income, or anyone that just needs some money to get by the day or month, to use this system to generate a solid income. Although, access to the mobile application and website it free to all, I must include a monthly subscription fee towards the gatherers. This is to generate enough income to reward providers for what they are doing, and to maintain and upgrade WasteQuest. Oh, let's not forget! A monthly GiveGreen Raffle will be held by WasteQuest, for all participating members in the quest to a healthier Planet! The raffle will have a select number of winners and we will be giving away cash and prizes. This includes gift cards, goods, getaways, and some fresh cash to spend! Everyone deserves a break and some time away from work. Here at WasteQuest we strongly believe in giving back to the people, so in turn the people will be motivated to clean up and reduce waste. I will be describing each part in its own category below.

I have created demo non-functional templates. This will show what I have in mind for the look and feel of WasteQuest. I am working on this entire project alone and do not have the skills and the tools needed to make it into a fully functioning and live application. That's why I've come to Indiegogo to help me make this come to life. The whole thing already exists, I just need the people to give me an opportunity and accept it.
Now the details....
Provider

The provider, gets unlimited access and listing on WasteQuest. The providers role is to collect and distribute the waste he/she usually throws away, which ends up in our dumps, and later our oceans. Now you will be getting paid for all the waste you were ignoring. All you need to do is collect and sacrifice some living space. Keep in mind that that space is retrievable, the damage being done by you and everyone else that is just disregarding the world, and sending everything to the dumps, is absolutely irreversible. What the provider is doing really, is that he/she is hitting two birds with one stone. While the provider collects and distributes, he/she is contributing to the Planet, and at the same time contributing to individuals and families who can really use the money they receive from reusing and recycling.
Free Unlimited access and listing
Collects and distributes
Material Pricing Directory for help with pricing of Lots
Enrollment in Monthly Refund Program+ 20% ( rounded to nearest dollar)  Collectors Fee towards Gatherer, for each individual lot: based on value. Earn over 30% cash back from your waste!
User profile displaying your contributions and average monthly gain. Users will be able to add you to their ""Watch list"" to follow up on new listings.
Will receive a monthly check and certificate of contribution displaying statistics for that month. Pounds of material recycled, how they helped, and what they saved.
Automatic Monthly GiveGreen Raffle Entry
Helping to reduce waste, clean the planet, and contribute to people in need
Providers User Profile
User Profile

The providers will be able to build a user profile displaying their ranking  and stats. Viewing the users average monthly income through WasteQuest, and how much he/she is contributing to the community. Also, you will be able to contact the provider through messaging and ask for tips and advice on how they are managing their lots and materials. WasteQuest will be and always will remain an honest,supportive, and loving community.
Gatherer

The Gatherers role, is to reuse, recycle, and reduce the waste in his/her community for income. There are millions of people that walk,drive, and search for materials and things they can use, or recycle. With WasteQuest we are bringing these materials and items directly to your home, computer, and pocket. My goal is to connect the people to encourage a more efficient, faster, and rewarding experience when they decide to recycle. WasteQuest will be available to anyone with internet access, and I strongly encourage people who need a solid source of income for rent money, gas, bills. clothes, anything they wish, to check out WasteQuest and see what they can gain from it. Families in need, and the unemployed individuals will cherish this system for its availability and opportunities of income it provides. I would love to see millions of people using WasteQuest, and have the people accept it, so we can see drastic changes in our communities and our environment. The website and mobile application will be available for free to view listings and see materials  and items available. I will need to include a monthly subscription fee towards the Gatherer, and this is for maintaining the system, upgrades, rewarding providers, and holding raffles. Although, I must include a monthly fee, it will barely have any impact on families and individuals using the application. The positive increase in their daily work will be so great, that they will not hesitate to support my program with a monthly fee. Also, the 20% collectors fee must be paid by the Gatherer to the Provider, as a sign of appreciation. This is all calculated and will not affect the Gatherer in any way. The gas they spend driving around searching, or the energy spent walking will be cut down drastically, and the gain will be much greater. I have talked to many individuals who recycle and would love for a program like this to exist. I have mentioned the fees and they all agreed to pay if it would be available. So here it is!
Collects to Reuse, Recycle, and Reduce
Faster and more efficient way to find recyclables and reusable materials
Noticeable income growth per month
Ability to ""Watch"" the provider and track when he/she lists next and receives instant notifications for new lots.
For families and individuals that need a source of income
Automatic GiveGreen Monthly Raffle Entry
Subscription fee of $5.99/ mo + 20% Collector's Fee per lot: based on value (rounded to nearest dollar)
Recycling our way to a better and healthier planet
Watch List- For Gatherers
Watch List

With the Watch List, the gatherer will be able to track and follow the providers monthly average lots and common materials. Also, the Watch List will include a notification system to let gatherers know the provider has a new listing. When the user opens the providers profile that is where they will find the watch icon. This system will accelerate the entire WasteQuest process.
Choose Your Role! How will you support your community?
3 Different View Modes
There will be different viewing styles to fit each users needs.
Home screen & 3 different view styles
Monthly Ranked Refund Program - For Providers

The Monthly Ranked Refund Program is for Providers so they can receive money from WasteQuest for their participation. The ranking system displays your Lots collected and distributed, and each rank will have a separate name and badge. In every level you are given the opportunity to make more money and continue to grow! It is entirely up to you to choose how far you can push yourself and keep trying to beat last months achievements! The refund program is generating income for Providers that just discarded their waste and had a total loss of money. Now you are given the chance to accumulate over 30% of your spending back from your collected waste! All you need to do is collect, list, and distribute.
Rank 1= 1-4 Lots - $3-$12- Avg/Mo/Income - $18- Collector's Fee Included
Rank 2= 5-9 Lots - $15- $27- Avg/Mo/Income- $42- Collector's Fee Included
Rank 3= 10+ Lots - $30+ $2 additional per drop after 10- Avg/Mo/income- $60+ - Collector's Fee Included
Minimum Lot size value should be around $8+ to be considered a point towards ranking and to be eligible for 20% Collectors fee.
I am open to people deciding the best ranking names. If you have any in mind please don't hesitate to post in the comment section. I assure you it will not go unnoticed.
Common Recyclable Material Value Chart

Once I am able to hire developers and build a team, I will be including a daily updated price list of the most common materials. Providers can use this directory for estimated pricing towards their Lot Value. Based on the estimated value, they will receive 20% from Gatherers, as a sign of appreciation. This gives the Provider total control over growth and planning of how to list his/her lots to get their top dollar back from garbage he/she used to throw away! Now you can use the money towards anything you like! How about some groceries to recycle the process? Just collect and build reasonable lot sizes to distribute to people willing to do the rest of the work! On average with the Collectors fee and the Refund Program, you will be receiving over 30% cash back monthly towards your spent money that generated the waste in the first place! Also, I would love to make available an instant material pricing Online help or Phone Support, for materials that might be missing from our directory. This is to get everyone the right pricing, and to continue to grow our material pricing database.
Nearest Recycling Centers

WasteQuest will also be able to help you find the nearest recycling center. It will contain all information needed from what type of materials they recycle, to when they close, and how to get there. You will be given the option to navigate there and contact the company.
Total Income Simulator

I will be including a Total Income Simulator for both roles. With this system you can predict and experiment what you can accomplish per day or month. The Total Income Simulator will give you a good template on how to make more money, your expenses, etc. I am working on providing the community with as much tools as possible so the job gets easier and becomes faster.  In return, these tools will make recycling more efficient and overall more rewarding.
GiveGreen Monthly Raffle

Every end of the month, WasteQuest will be holding a raffle for its users! I strongly believe in giving back to the people, and just making life that much easier. From the revenue gained from WasteQuest, we will focus on making the community happier and healthier, by supporting everyone that supports us.
Cash Prizes
Goods giveaways
Vacation getaways
Gas cards, gift cards
The prizes will get greater as we encourage more people to participate in the Green Revolution!

I would love to have the chance to award the top contributor of each month with a tailored vacation getaway. I want to give someone the chance to plan their own trip where ever they want to go. With a set amount of credit they will be able to decide and WasteQuest would love to make it happen.
Rules
Provider's Lot must be about $8 in material value to be reasonable for listing.

Gatherer will be able to reserve 2 Lots every 15 minutes. Their account will be restricted from further bookings temporarily. This is to balance the distribution of materials to all people as equally as possible, and give everyone an opportunity.
Gatherer must show booking conformation to Provider before the transaction to validate that he/she is the correct person that reserved the Lot(s) .

The GiveGreen Raffle will occur every month before the month ends. So people receive their prizes before big bad rent and bills come around!. We will be giving away cash, gift cards, getaways, and the prizes just get better with more users. All people participating in WasteQuest will be entered in the monthly raffle. Give back and grow!
Fees

I do not enjoy charging a fee for the service. I am forced to because of the system. The revenue will go mostly towards Providers Monthly Refunds and our GiveGreen Raffle. The rest of the money will be spent towards maintaining and updating the system, and of course paying the Apple and Android based markets. The fees are as follows:

Monthly subscription fee of $5.99 for Gatherers. You will be given free download and access to the application, but in order to access reservations and contact information, you must enroll in the monthly subscription.

A 20% Collectors Fee (rounded to nearest dollar)  will have to be paid upon pick-up to the Provider per Lot. Again, we must show our appreciation. There is much to be gained from WasteQuest, I do not believe these minimal fees will interfere with peoples financial status.
What do ""Lots"" and ""Reservations"" mean?

A ""Lot"" is referring to the material value and completed amount of the material you have collected as a Provider. Your 20% fee will be based on material value you have collected and these will be identified as ""Lots"".

Reserving"" is referring to the process when after searching through the listings and when you are ready to pick it up, you must first ""Reserve"" it to yourself and your account. This way the ""Provider"" knows there is someone on the way to pick up their collected materials, and it is used to validate the ""Gatherers"" identity. Gatherers are allowed only 2 Lot reservations every 15 minutes to promote a balanced system.
Now You're Ready!
Risks and challenges

The challenges that come with this project is really the funding, and acceptance from the people. I have worked on this all on my own and if I was to be able to hire a professional developer for the mobile application and the website, and build a TEAM! I wouldn't have any problems. I have no prior experience in any of this, but I have managed to build a sample mobile application displaying what I have in mind. I am fully capable of leaping over every hurdle put in front of me. All my plans are written and solidified. I only need to produce the full application. Everything from beginning to end I have stored in my imagination. I know exactly what I want it to look like and I've tried to duplicate my imagination with the simple online tools I was provided. Didn't come out how I see it but its a template to show you that I know what I'm aiming for. I am not worried about putting my time into developing and launching the website and application I know it will be successful. I only need the funding and people to help achieve this. Thank you everyone for your support! It will never be forgotten and always will be appreciated. I will be forever in dept to all the people that supported a healthier, smarter, and more efficient generation. Thank you Indiegogo, for believing in my work and my goals. Without you I would not have the opportunity, nor the recognition to be able to pull this off.
- Aram Mikayelian",9.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Glendale, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/wastequest-a-smarter-planet-for-a-brighter-future/pica

Plastic straws are bad news: for the planet, for wildlife, and especially for us.  You can read more about the science in the hotlinks below, but here are the headlines:
<ul>
• An estimated 8.3 billion straws already litter the beaches of the world.
• A further 8 million tonnes of plastic a year end up in the oceans, or one garbage truck of plastic dumped into the ocean every minute.
• Plastic straws make up only 1% of ocean plastic, but that still amounts to around 100 garbage trucks of straws every week!
• At current rates, by 2050 the ocean will contain more plastic than fish.
<li>
Plastic doesn't biodegrade -  sunlight and wave action breaks it into smaller and smaller pieces until they are too tiny to see with the naked eye.
<li>
These microplastics get everywhere
column2: they are in the water, air, and soil of every country on the planet, as well as many of the foods we eat and the drinks we consume, all in much higher quantities than we first thought.

column1: • The average adult consumes about 500,000 pieces of microplastic a year, and breathes in about the same amount again (children ingest about 40,000 pieces a year).

• We don't yet know what the effect of this is on the human body, but we do know that some plastics can release toxic chemicals and that some microplastics are small enough to penetrate human tissue, which should be more than enough to terrify us all.

This is why plastic straws are bad. This is why single-use plastics are bad and why we HAVE to stop the tide of trash and clean up the oceans as soon as possible - of course we are trying to save the many, many animals who die every year from eating or tangling in plastic, but mostly we are trying to save our collective hides.
Oh, except for Trump. He's not trying to save anyone but himself.

I know Trump doesn't represent our international community.  I know you want better than that and so do I.  We've got a long way to go but I know that Greta Thunberg and the climate scientists are getting through, that the UN's Sustainable Development Goals are driving us, that our governments are finally starting to ban plastics and fossil fuels, declaring climate emergencies because we demand their action.
I know that we are all capable of taking the actions we need to take, to secure a healthy future for humanity.  And I know that if we all pull together we can move mountains.
So I'm asking us to move a mountain now.
By contributing to this campaign, you are:
<ul>
<li>
Sending a message to Trump that his self interest SUCKS - I'll be sending a letter to The White House with our Big Total, just to make sure he gets the news!

• Sending a message to the leaders and governments and CEOs of the world that single-use plastic is over, that you know the health of humanity and the health of the planet are directly linked, and that we, the people, demand a fully sustainable future.
<li>
Giving money to environmental charities and organisations to do important work.
<li>
Supporting a start-up eco business to get off the ground.
• Getting a really cool reusable metal straw in the process, which will be FANTASTIC to drink out of, look super-hot on instagram, and will prevent you from personally using up to 580 straws a year!
<li>
AND one tree will be planted for every straw you order, to make sure it's neutral.
Everybody wins, right?! (Except Trump, but I'm really ok with that).

We really want to raise more money for the environment than Trump can raise for himself, which means our BIG goal is to raise over £500,000 ($600,000). That's the amount that is going to make a real statement, a real impact on the environment, and help our message get heard.

Since he's selling a packet of 10 single-use plastic straws for $15, I've set my rewards to start at an equivalent £12. That means I need to give away about 42,000 steel straws to beat his record. I need 42,000 of you wonderful people out there to believe in me and this campaign.

But of course, my go/no-go threshold is much lower. The minimum amount I need to raise to make this work is £12,000 - just 1,000 straws. Any less than this by early October and the project will not go ahead, the trees will not get planted, and all donations will be refunded :(
Your donations will enable environmental organisations to continue to work in three areas that are key for human survival.
Ocean Cleanup Charities:  Research and plastic cleanup activities in and around the water.
Reforestation Charities:  Planting trees, sinking carbon and rejuvenating the lungs of our planet.
Waste Prevention:  Funding Love Zero's operation for as long as possible
column2: I will be able to offer free workshops, webinars, courses, coaching, digital content, meetup groups and speaking engagements to spread the zero waste message far and wide.

column1: I also commit to publishing the actual figures of this campaign publicly so the whole world can see that I've spent the money the way I've promised I would.

Beautiful people of the world, I believe in you.  I believe you care enough about the future of humanity to stand with me against Trump and his stupid plastic straws and all the single-use trash that we are addicted to.  I believe that you've been waiting for your moment to step up, for the call to action that reaches everyone, and I believe that together, today, you and I are going to create a phenomenon.  We are going to create an outcry so loud that those in power are going to hear us, and take notice.  We are going to change the way we all look at straws and everything else like them.

You can be part of this phenomenon.  These beautiful steel straws are an investment in your future and in the future of this planet.  But if you can't donate to the campaign then you can still join us by spreading the word, telling all your friends, liking, sharing, or even tweeting Trump about us (#ZeroStraws).
Let's make the conversation about straws bigger than the ego of the biggest braggart on the planet!

My name is Teja Hudson, and I founded my social enterprise Love Zero because I realised that humanity only thrives when the planet thrives, and working towards a sustainable future represents our best chance of survival.

I aim to work with business leaders to reduce and prevent waste before it's made, providing coaching, consulting, workshops, courses and content around strategy, actions and behaviour change.  I specialise in the small actions we can take now that will lead to bigger actions and significant change.
*Please Note: the straws shown in this campaign are prototypes and final reward items may vary slightly from those pictured.

In late July, three pallets worth of equipment and uniforms that had been generously donated by the friends of Empowering Success started its long journey from the UK to our Black Mambas in the Greater Kruger.
Two months on we are still awaiting its arrival and we have just been informed that it has been held up due to some unexpected costs that have popped up. This is where we need your help!
Please donate what you can, share where you can and help where you can!
We desperately need it to arrive so it can be put to use as soon as possible, but it can not be released for its destination until payment has been made. So we need to reach our goal urgently!

Fundemar (fundemardr.org) is a non-profit environmental organization in the Dominican Republic dedicated to promoting the sustainable use of marine ecosystems and resources through it's commitment to research, education, and the development of conservation projects. Created in 1991, the organization and it's team of national and international volunteers has worked with local and international partner organizations as well as coastal communities to protect the area's marine life and ensure that it is available for all to enjoy.

This campaign hopes to raise funds to be able to put on Fundemar's 3rd Annual Lion Fish tournament, to take place on the 13th of December. Every year, Fundemar gets together with local restaurants, dive shops, and fisherman in order to organize and put on a community lion fishing tournament. The tournaments are aimed at helping to stop the threat of the spread of the invasive lion fish species here in the Caribbean and prevent the loss of biodiversity that accompanies their presence in an area.

Fundemar's past annual tournaments have seen more than 900 lion fish eliminated from local waters by the more than 80 participants, made up of both local community members and visitors looking to get involved. With your help, we can make this year's tournament the most successful one yet and put a stop to the lion fish threat!

About the Tournament

The tournament will take place during the day of the 13th of December with participants competing to hunt as many lion fish in the area as possible. At the conclusion of the tournament, we'll have prizes in the categories, of most, biggest, and smallest fish and then all of the participants will get together with other members of the community to eat the catch and promote the fish's consumption.

All told, it costs about $2,000 dollars to put on the tournament in order to pay for the equipment, banners, prizes, t-shirts for participants, and food to cook with the lion fish. We're looking to raise half that amount from our sponsors here in Bayahibe but we need help to make up the difference. In the past, we've received money as part of a USAID grant but as the term of that grant has expired, we need YOU to help support us and our mission to protect the region's biodiversity.
Why Hunt Lion Fish?

The lion fish is an invasive species that poses a grave threat to the marine ecosystems in the region. A voracious predator, it reproduces rapidly and faces no natural predators in the area to keep its population under control. Studies have shown that there is an 80% decrease in the biodiversity of coral reefs in which the fish is found.

The tournament is meant to massively fish the species in the area and promote its capture and consumption within the community in order to control the invasion and raise awareness of the threat that the fish poses to our coral reefs.

Besides donating money, you can contribute by spreading the word about Fundemar and this campaign whether it be through email, facebook, or old fashioned word of mouth. Also, visit our website and 'like' our facebook page to learn more about us and the work that we do. And by all means, come down to Bayahibe on the 13th and become a lion fish hunter yourself! Together, we can work to protect the marine environment and ensure that it is available for the enjoyment of generations to come.

Every year, Fundemar gets together with local restaurants, dive shops, and fisherman in order to organize and put on a community lion fishing tournament. The tournaments are aimed at helping to stop the threat of the spread of the invasive lion fish species here in the Caribbean and prevent the loss of biodiversity that accompanies their presence in an area.

Fundemar's past annual tournaments have seen more than 900 lion fish eliminated from local waters by the more than 80 participants, made up of both local community members and visitors looking to get involved. With your help, we can make this year's tournament the most successful one yet and put a stop to the lion fish threat!

About the Tournament The tournament will take place during the day of the 13th of December with participants competing to hunt as many lion fish in the area as possible. At the conclusion of the tournament, we'll have prizes in the categories, of most, biggest, and smallest fish and then all of the participants will get together with other members of the community to eat the catch and promote the fish's consumption.

All told, it costs about $2,000 dollars to put on the tournament in order to pay for the equipment, banners, prizes, t-shirts for participants, and food to cook with the lion fish. We're looking to raise half that amount from our sponsors here in Bayahibe but we need help to make up the difference. In the past, we've received money as part of a USAID grant but as the term of that grant has expired, we need YOU to help support us and our mission to protect the region's biodiversity.
Why Hunt Lion Fish?

The lion fish is an invasive species that poses a grave threat to the marine ecosystems in the region. A voracious predator, it reproduces rapidly and faces no natural predators in the area to keep its population under control. Studies have shown that there is an 80% decrease in the biodiversity of coral reefs in which the fish is found.

The tournament is meant to massively fish the species in the area and promote its capture and consumption within the community in order to control the invasion and raise awareness of the threat that the fish poses to our coral reefs.
Other Ways You Can Help

Besides donating money, you can contribute by spreading the word about Fundemar and this campaign whether it be through email, facebook, or old fashioned word of mouth. Also, visit our website and 'like' our facebook page to learn more about us and the work that we do. And by all means, come down to Bayahibe on the 13th and become a lion fish hunter yourself! Together, we can work to protect the marine environment and ensure that it is available for the enjoyment of generations to come.",0.0,0,"3 Campaigns
|","Bayahibe, Dominican Republic",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/3rd-annual-bayahibe-lion-fish-tournament/pica

Canada is now the only country within the UN that does not support the goal of fighting drought.
By opting out of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification we're sending a clear message to the world. We don't care.
I Don't Believe This
Canadians do care. Our government just doesn't understand how important the welfare of people across the world is to us.
Help tell our government that.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp
Canada's contribution to the treaty is $350,000. If we raise it for them, how can they not continue to support this important effort? The additional money is to pay the Indiegogo fees.
For $1.00, every cent of which will go to the Receiver General, we can eliminate the only reason the government has not to support the convention.
Put Canada back on the environmental map.
If we don't reach our goal, no funds will be drawn.
Who am I? I'm just a Canadian, like you, who doesn't want to see our Canadian brand further eroded by the ill-advised decisions of our government.
<div>

Please share!
